description: The Ai Auto Tool Content Writing Assistant (Gemini Writer, ChatGPT ) All in One plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the save_post_data() function in versions 2.0.7 to 2.2.6. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to create and publish arbitrary posts.

product.name: Ai Auto Tool Content Writing Assistant (Gemini Writer, ChatGPT ) All in One
